item.title: 沙特电信公司第一季度利润创 2006 年以来新高
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯顶级电信公司公布了自 2006 年以来最强劲的第一季度利润，因为该公司从国内业务中获得了更多收入。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s top telecom company reported its strongest first-quarter profit since 2006 as it made more revenue from business at home.】

item.title: 印度银行股承压，因为贷款规则草案可能会有影响
item.description: 印度银行已成为该国股票市场的一大风险来源，而最近的大跌则是由可能提高支持某些项目的贷款拨备的拟议规定引起的。【原文：Indian banks have emerged as a big source of risk in the country’s stock market, following a recent selloff caused by proposed rules that may raise provisioning for loans backing certain projects.】

item.title: 印度航空低成本部门因机组人员请病假而取消航班
item.description: 根据跟踪公司 FlightAware 的数据，印度航空公司的廉价航空公司自周二以来取消了近 30 个航班，因为机舱乘务员集体请病假。【原文：Air India Ltd.’s budget carrier canceled almost 30 flights since Tuesday, according to data from tracking company FlightAware, after cabin crew called in sick en masse.】

item.title: 匈牙利工业在短暂上升后出现超预期萎缩
item.description: 周三的数据显示，匈牙利的工业正在艰难地复苏，国内消费部门正在推动经济增长，并为公共财政提供急需的支持。【原文：Hungary’s industry is struggling to recover, data showed Wednesday, leaving the domestic consumer sector to drive growth and provide badly-needed support for public finances.】

item.title: 韩国监管机构要求调查对冲基金 Regal
item.description: 据知情人士透露，韩国检察官被要求对对冲基金 Regal Funds Management Pty 涉嫌违反资本市场规则的行为进行调查。【原文：South Korea’s prosecutors were asked to conduct an investigation into hedge fund Regal Funds Management Pty for alleged capital markets rules violations, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 德国工业生产今年首次出现萎缩
item.description: 德国工业产值今年首次出现下降，凸显出这个欧洲最大经济体在工业领域面临的持久挑战。【原文：German industrial output fell for the first time this year — highlighting the sector’s enduring challenges within Europe’s largest economy.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
item.description: 2024年4月23日星期二，英国伦敦市，伦敦证券交易所集团公司的标志显示在该公司办公中庭的一块板上。4 月 21 日（周一），富时 100 指数收盘价创下一年多来的新高，原因是近期股市波动和地缘政治风险促使投资者纷纷涌入英国基准指数中的防御性板块。【原文：A London Stock Exchange Group Plc logo displayed on a board in the company's office atrium in the City of London, UK, on Tuesday, April 23, 2024. The FTSE 100 Index closed at a record high, on Monday, April 21, for the first time in more than a year, as recent equity market volatility and geopolitical risks prompted investors to pile into the defensive sectors that characterize the UK benchmark.】

item.title: 阿尔斯通将出售股份筹资 10 亿欧元以改善财务状况
item.description: 阿尔斯通公司正计划增资约 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元），以支撑其财务状况，此前该公司在英国的一个大型项目出现延误，而且在收购加拿大一家火车制造竞争对手的过程中不断陷入困境。【原文：Alstom SA is planning a capital increase of about €1 billion ($1.1 billion) to shore up its finances after delays on a major project in the UK and ongoing struggles from the acquisition of a Canadian train-making rival.】

item.title: 汽车制造成本增加导致宝马盈利下降
item.description: 由于制造成本上升影响了豪华汽车制造商的盈利能力，宝马汽车公司第一季度盈利下降。【原文：BMW AG’s earnings declined in the first quarter after rising manufacturing costs weighed on the luxury-car maker’s profitability.】

item.title: 马来西亚股市涨势有望延续，市值再创新高
item.description: 在本地基金的大力支持下，随着外国投资者重返市场，马来西亚股市将继续反弹。【原文：A rally in Malaysian stocks is set to continue amid strong support from local funds and as foreign investors return to the market.】

item.title: 印度经济顾问称印度经济增长可在十年内突破 6.5
item.description: 印度首席经济顾问阿南塔-纳格斯瓦兰（V. Anantha Nageswaran）表示，在实体和数字基础设施投资的支持下，印度经济可以在十年内保持 6.5%-7% 以上的增长。【原文：India’s economy can sustain growth of more than 6.5%-7% for a decade, supported by investment in physical and digital infrastructure, the country’s Chief Economic Advisor V. Anantha Nageswaran said.】

item.title: 万科出售总部项目，剥离资产套现
item.description: 中国万科集团计划出售一个曾被指定为其新总部的未完工房地产项目，这是该开发商为剥离资产和提高流动性所做的最新努力。【原文：China Vanke Co. plans to sell an unfinished property project once designated as its new headquarters, the developer’s latest effort to divest assets and boost liquidity.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 西门子能源公司将裁员减产，应对风电部门的艰难转型
item.description: 西门子能源股份公司（Siemens Energy AG）在解决风力涡轮机业务困境的决策上取得了进展。【原文：Siemens Energy AG is making headway on decisions to fix its troubled wind turbine business.】

item.title: 阿布扎比银行开设中国前哨站，开拓与非洲日益增长的贸易关系
item.description: Absa Group Ltd.在中国开设了一家非银行子公司，加剧了非洲最大贷款机构在世界第二大经济体抢占市场份额的竞争。【原文：Absa Group Ltd. opened a non-banking subsidiary in China, ratcheting up the race among Africa’s largest lenders to capture market share in the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 西班牙中央银行可能首次由女性领导
item.description: 西班牙可能即将成为欧元区四大经济体中第一个任命女性领导央行的国家。【原文：Spain may be about to become the first of the euro zone’s four biggest economies to name a woman to lead its central bank.】

item.title: 如果英国央行转向资产出售，亨特或将为减税净赚 100 亿英镑
item.description: 根据英国央行披露的信息，如果英国央行停止出售其十多年来在量化宽松政策下购买的债券，英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）每年将有额外的100亿英镑用于减税。【原文：UK Chancellor Jeremy Hunt would have an extra £10 billion a year for tax cuts if the Bank of England stopped selling the bonds it bought over more than a decade under quantitative easing, according to BOE disclosures.】

item.title: 瑞典房价因购房者预期降息而上涨
item.description: 瑞典房价连续第三个月上涨，原因是购房者期望从较低的借贷成本中得到一些缓解。【原文：Swedish home prices rose for a third month as buyers expect some relief from lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 肯尼亚洪灾助推鲁托的经济适用房计划
item.description: 肯尼亚的洪灾造成数百人死亡，数千人流离失所，这也帮助威廉-鲁托总统兑现了他备受争议的竞选承诺之一：经济适用房。【原文：Flooding in Kenya that’s killed hundreds of people and displaced thousands more is helping President William Ruto push one of his controversial campaign promises: Affordable housing.】

item.title: 日元干预为散户投资者提供了购买美元的机会
item.description: 对于日本在货币市场上颇具影响力的个人投资者群体来说，最近一次疑似支持日元的干预行动是他们大肆囤积美元的绝佳机会。【原文：For Japan’s influential group of individual investors in the currency market, the latest suspected interventions to support the yen come as an ideal opportunity to load up on dollars.】

item.title: 摩根大通在内幕交易案中限制对 Segantii 的风险敞口
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is limiting dealings with Simon Sadler’s Segantii Capital Management Ltd., the Asian hedge fund giant charged with insider trading by authorities in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: GIC 新加坡私人信贷团队投资组合经理离职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，曾在新加坡主权财富基金 GIC Pte 负责私人信贷交易的投资组合经理丹尼尔-林（Daniel Lim）已离开该公司。【原文：Daniel Lim, portfolio manager who worked on private credit deals at Singapore sovereign wealth fund GIC Pte, has left the firm, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国海亮计划在摩洛哥建铜厂以开发西方用户
item.description: 浙江海亮股份有限公司是铜管和铜杆的主要生产商，该公司计划斥资 2.88 亿美元在摩洛哥建厂，生产包括锂电池箔在内的新能源材料，以满足全球日益增长的需求。【原文：Zhejiang Hailiang Co., a major producer of copper tubes and rods, plans to build a plant in Morocco for $288 million that manufactures new energy materials, including lithium-battery foil, to tap rising demand around the world.】

item.title: 惠誉预计印度卢比将因债券流入而反弹至 1 美元兑 82 卢比
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）认为，外国资金可能大量流入印度债券，这将有助于卢比从历史低点附近回升，但印度央行可能会限制涨幅。【原文：The potential big foreign inflows into Indian bonds will help the rupee recover from near a record low, but the nation’s central bank is likely to limit the extent of gains, according to Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: 中国激增的工业贷款流向了错误的地方
item.description: 随着中国的工业产能成为一个关键的贸易问题，中国银行对该行业的贷款激增经常被作为中国政府正在重新推动制造业发展的证据，这可能会使廉价商品充斥全球市场。【原文：As China’s industrial capacity emerged as a key trade issue, a surge in Chinese bank loans to the sector has often been cited as evidence that Beijing is engaging in a renewed manufacturing push that could flood global markets with cheap goods.】

item.title: 利率走向不明，台湾债券交易量放缓
item.description: 在利率前景不明朗的情况下，台湾的债券交易员最近并不热心。【原文：Bond traders in Taiwan aren’t an enthused lot these days amid uncertainty over the outlook for interest rates.】

item.title: 中国政策性银行偿还中国人民银行的速度创下新高，转而购买债券
item.description: 随着中国债券市场的强劲反弹，中国所谓的政策性银行正在放弃将中国人民银行作为资金来源，转而急于举债。【原文：As the Chinese bond market undergoes a powerful rally, the nation’s so-called policy banks are turning away from the People’s Bank of China as a source of funding and rushing to raise debt instead.】

item.title: 瑞银任命三位新的澳大利亚和新西兰债务主管
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）为其在澳大利亚和新西兰的债务资本市场业务任命了一系列领导层，以拓展该业务在全球的发展。【原文：UBS Group AG has made a slew of leadership appointments for its debt capital markets business in Australia and New Zealand as it expands that business around the world.】

item.title: KKR 将以 14 亿美元收购澳大利亚 Perpetual 公司的两个股份
item.description: 澳大利亚基金管理公司 Perpetual Ltd.同意与私募股权公司 KKR & Co.达成协议，以 21.75 亿澳元（14.3 亿美元）的价格出售其财富管理和企业信托部门。【原文：Australian funds manager Perpetual Ltd. agreed to a deal with private equity firm KKR & Co. for a sale of its wealth management and corporate trust units for A$2.175 billion ($1.43 billion).】

item.title: 摩根士丹利策略师警告不要追逐中国股市涨幅
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）认为，中国股市是全球最大的股市之一，其上涨势头可能会减弱。【原文：The momentum behind one of the world’s biggest stock rallies in China will likely abate, according to Morgan Stanley.】
